definition: of the highest quality, a serve that the receiver is unable to reach, to score a point by a serving a ball that an opponent fails to touch in tennis or similar games
details:
adjective
- of the highest quality
= example: of the highest quality
= synonyms: super
noun
- a serve that the receiver is unable to reach
= example: a serve that the receiver is unable to reach
- one of four playing cards in a deck having a single pip on its face
= example: one of four playing cards in a deck having a single pip on its face
- someone who is dazzlingly skilled in any field
= example: someone who is dazzlingly skilled in any field
= synonyms: champion
verb
- to score a point by a serving a ball that an opponent fails to touch in tennis or similar games
= example: to score a point by a serving a ball that an opponent fails to touch in tennis or similar games
- to play a golf hole in one stroke
= example: to play a golf hole in one stroke
- to score an ace against
= example: to score an ace against
- to succeed at easily
= example: to succeed at easily
= synonyms: nail, breeze through, pass with flying colors, sweep through, sail through
